name: new_force
title: New force per player
author: Maxikaaz
description: This mod just creates new force for each player. Those forces are enemies, but they can share vision (if use radars). Each placed radar entity is moved to special force which is firendly with all other forces. This is intender for freeplay PvP server, as you don't want to trust anyone comming to your base, but it's just nice to see otehr players and map.
